# FFmpeg Stderr Output Test Fixture
#
# Tested with:
#   ffmpeg version 8.0 Copyright (c) 2000-2025 the FFmpeg developers
#   built with gcc 15.2.0 (GCC)
#   libavutil      60.  8.100
#   libavcodec     62. 11.100
#   libavformat    62.  3.100
#
# Generated via: ffmpeg -loglevel verbose -i <stream> -f null -
#
# If parsing breaks after FFmpeg upgrade, compare stderr format changes.
#
# Normal HLS playback:
[hls @ 0x55f8a1b2c3d0] Opening 'http://10.177.0.10:17080/stream.m3u8' for reading

frame=   60 fps=30.0 q=-1.0 size=N/A time=00:00:02.00 bitrate=N/A speed=1.00x

frame=   90 fps=30.0 q=-1.0 size=N/A time=00:00:03.00 bitrate=N/A speed=1.00x
